title: WTTF/WTS-Bill Burns Wild PRINTER'S SCRAP- For Cobbs or Cash

posts.post_title: WTTF/WTS-Bill Burns Wild PRINTER'S SCRAP- For Cobbs or Cash
posts.post_content:
Hello!!

up for sacrifice is a really cool Bill Burns Authentic Printer's scrap....


sorry for the poor scan....

I have had this for years..i had it slabbed personally and had acquired this many years ago from a hobby legend


... card has a wild DOUBLE EXPOSURE front of sleepy bill burns (the player is actually so off register, it's considered "double exposed" or "double printed")....it has so much extra cardboard, hard not to dispute being a printer's scrap.....there are remnants of the next card on top and bottom there is so much extra cardboard......part of the next name is also visible on top!!! the image is so off register/exposed bill burns is printed way out side front border......back has some paper loss due to scrap book removal...

WILD CARD!! AUTHENTIC printer's scrap.....VERY RARE!

A chance to own a very unique, one of a kind item.....scraps have yet to reach their potential......this will make some heads turn and add some flavor to any t206 collection....

likely one of a kind:eek:



I am currently paying off another large scrap purchase , so id prefer cash, but will consider COBB TRADES....especially GREEN COBB>>>>


CASH OR COBB/COBBS

$1600.00 OR BO  or show me some COBBS


EMAIL PREFER

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]
do you have a better scan/photo so I can determine the player at top?
great to see you post....i'll check later, but I believe its still burns:)
